remarks: The norm of a pre-Hilbert space augmented with norm.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 8-Oct-2015.)
statement:
tchval.n $e |- G = ( toCHil ` W ) $.
tchnmval.n $e |- N = ( norm ` G ) $.
tchnmval.v $e |- V = ( Base ` W ) $.
tchnmval.h $e |- ., = ( .i ` W ) $.
tchnmfval $p |- ( W e. Grp -> N = ( x e. V |-> ( sqrt ` ( x ., x ) ) ) ) $.
$d ., x $.
$d G x $.
$d V x $.
$d W x $.
